mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey ( id, birthdate, telecom_provider, plan_name, plan_price, family_bundle, family_num ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{birthdate}, #{telecomProvider}, #{planName}, #{planPrice}, #{familyBundle}, #{familyNum} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE birthdate = VALUES(birthdate), telecom_provider = VALUES(telecom_provider), plan_name = VALUES(plan_name), plan_price = VALUES(plan_price), family_bundle = VALUES(family_bundle), family_num = VALUES(family_num)
